sentence.Network_en: Her amaryllis died. Did I want the fondue pot?

sentence.Network_en: One the 17 th century, the missionary brought the Southern Hemisphere's new discovery - the amaryllis bulbs into Taiwan.

sentence.Network_en: The bulb of Amaryllis vittata was used explant to establish the technique system of tissue culture.

list.abs: ...非常美丽壮观，俗名为巴西女王（empress of Brazil）。花瓣颜色为淡紫色至蓝色，花序及花形与孤挺花属|孤挺花类似，因此被称为蓝色孤挺花（blue amaryllis）。== 形态 ==多年生草本植物，鳞茎很大，是石蒜科石蒜亚科的植物中极为罕见及最高大的植物之一，地上茎高约1.5公尺.

derivation.yuyuan_name: modern Latin, from Latin Amaryllis (from Greek Amarullis), a name for a country girl in pastoral poetry

means.word_mean: 1. bulbous plant having showy white to reddish flowers
